articles.title: Man who infected woman with HIV is jailed for three years - Daily Mail
articles.description: A man who recklessly infected his then partner with HIV before being deported to Jamaica has been extradited to the UK and jailed leaving his victim 'forever marred by his actions'.
articles.content:
A man who infected his partner with HIV has been extradited to the UK and jailed but only after 12 years of legal anguish for his victim who is 'forever marred by his actions'.

articles.title: 'Major moment in MS research' as new Octopus trial starts - BBC
articles.description: Ailsa explains what it is like facing progressive MS and hopes the new Octopus trial can help her.
articles.content:
"I was playing a game of ultimate frisbee and got fuzzy vision in one eye - a bit like looking through a steamed-up windscreen."
